item.title: Lola add a quote by Rainer Maria Rilke
item.description: "Let everything happen to you Beauty and terror Just keep going No feeling is final" -- Rainer Maria Rilke

item.title: Lola add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "Forever is composed of nows." -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: Lola add a quote by Jay Asher
item.description: "You can't go back to how things were. How you thought they were. All you really have is...now." -- Jay Asher

item.title: Lola add a quote by Lauren Kate
item.description: "The only way to survive eternity is to be able to appreciate each moment." -- Lauren Kate

item.title: Lola add a quote by Simone Elkeles
item.description: "If there's one thing I learned, it's that nobody is here forever. You have to live for the moment, each and every day . . . the here, the now." -- Simone Elkeles

item.title: Lola add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Realize deeply that the present moment is all you have. Make the NOW the primary focus of your life." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Lola add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "We spend precious hours fearing the inevitable. It would be wise to use that time adoring our families, cherishing our friends and living our lives." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Lola add a quote by Thich Nhat Hanh
item.description: "I promise myself that I will enjoy every minute of the day that is given me to live." -- Thich Nhat Hanh

item.title: Lola add a quote by Ida Scott Taylor
item.description: "Do not look back and grieve over the past, for it is gone; and do not be troubled about the future, for it has yet to come. Live in the present, and make it so beautiful that it will be worth remembering" -- Ida Scott Taylor

item.title: Lola add a quote by Orson Scott Card
item.description: "She worked her toes into the sand, feeling the tiny delicious pain of the friction of tiny chips of silicon against the tender flesh between her toes. That's life. It hurts, it's dirty, and it feels very, very good." -- Orson Scott Card

item.title: Lola add a quote by Horace Mann
item.description: "Lost, yesterday, somewhere between sunrise and sunset, two golden hours, each set with sixty diamond minutes. No reward is offered for they are gone forever." -- Horace Mann

item.title: Lola add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Love may forgive all infirmities and love still in spite of them: but Love cannot cease to will their removal." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Lola add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "For you will certainly carry out God's purpose, however you act, but it makes a difference to you whether you serve like Judas or like John." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Lola add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "The human spirit will not even begin to try to surrender self-will as long as all seems to be well with it. Now error and sin both have this property, that the deeper they are the less their victim suspects their existence; they are masked evil. Pain is unmasked, unmistakable evil; every man knows that something is wrong when he is being hurt." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Lola add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Love may, indeed, love the beloved when her beauty is lost: but not because it is lost. Love may forgive all infirmities and love still in spite of them: but Love cannot cease to will their removal. Love is more sensitive than hatred itself to every blemish in the belovedâ€¦ Of all powers he forgives most, but he condones least: he is pleased with little, but demands all." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Lola add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Try to exclude the possibility of suffering which the order of nature and the existence of free-wills involve, and you find that you have excluded life itself" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Lola add a quote by Donna Lynn Hope
item.description: "If you have to speculate if someone loves you and wants to be with you, chances are they don't. It's not that complicated. Love, in most cases, betrays the one feeling it. Don't waste moments waiting and wondering. Don't throw away your time dreaming of someone that doesn't want you. No one is that amazing, certainly not the one who would pass you up." -- Donna Lynn Hope

item.title: Lola add a quote by Leo Tolstoy
item.description: "Ah, if everyone was as sensitive as you! There's no girl who hasn't gone through that. And it's all so unimportant!" -- Leo Tolstoy

item.title: Lola add a quote by Jocelyn Soriano
item.description: "We cannot love a person with an all accepting, transcending and encompassing love without being hurt somewhat, without being disappointed, without being failed of our expectations. We cannot love without being broken, yet we cannot continue in love without being stronger than our brokenness." -- Jocelyn Soriano
